Desc.entry: Supports a broad range of visual artists and craftspeople through the provision of affordable and substainable studio space, professional support, facilities and services. The programme includes opportunities and services for schools and communities, training for artists and makers, artist residencies and exhibitions. Welcoming and engaging people in the visual arts and the creativity of Persistence Works and Porter Brook through the Open Studios and other public events. Company limited by guarantee No 3034923.

ContactName.entry: Rachael Dodd, Programme Manager/Viv Mager, Receptionist

category.entry: ART GALLERIES, ART WORKSHOPS AND STUDIOS FOR HIRE
